responses: Always happy to lend a hand!

patterns: what is EST Fkih Ben Salah
responses: The Higher School of Technology of Fkih Ben Salah is a higher education institution. It was created with the aim of building the first university in al-Faqih bin Saleh.
You can contact us at 05 23 43 46 66 or 05 23 43 49 99. Our email address is estfbs@usms.ma. You can also visit our website at estfbs.usms.ac.ma.

At EST-FBS, we offer the following academic programs:
- University Diploma in Technology (DUT):
  - Civil Engineering
  - Mining Engineering
  - Computer Engineering
  - Biological Engineering
  - Agri-Food Industry
  - Agrochemistry
  - Decisional Informatics and Statistics
  - Geometallurgy and Mining Geotechnics
  - Chemistry & Analysis Techniques
- Professional License:
  - Irrigation Techniques and Renewable Energies
  - Agri-Food Biotechnologies

patterns: information about the field of study
responses: The Computer Engineering field of study aims to train technicians specialized in computer application development.

patterns: goals of the field of study
responses: The main goal of the Computer Engineering field of study is to train technicians specialized in computer application development.
Graduates of the Computer Engineering field of study are in high demand in the job market due to their comprehensive technical training.

patterns: how to access the field of study
responses: To access the Computer Engineering field of study, students must hold a scientific or technical baccalaureate, or an equivalent recognized diploma.

The first semester of the Computer Engineering field of study consists of the following modules:
- Algorithmics and Basic Programming
- Computer Architecture
- Mathematics
- Languages and Techniques of Expression and Communication in Computer Science
